title: Nexus Siege not available?
body: Anyone know why its not up? I was under the impression that it would be live the entire weekend, or is it following the rotating queue times and gonna open at 1?

replies.body: [Nexus Siege ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/nexus-siege)should currently be available on NA and OCE.  Upon selecting Play, it will be available under PVP and bolded in Yellow font.  Please let us know if you have any questions!
It should be up on Oceania. Can you try restarting your client and seeing if that fixes the problem?
